name: phpseclib2/phpseclib2
description: PHP Secure Communications Library - Pure-PHP implementations of RSA, AES, SSH2, SFTP, X.509 etc.

suggest.ext-mcrypt: Install the Mcrypt extension in order to speed up a wide variety of cryptographic operations.
suggest.ext-gmp: Install the GMP (GNU Multiple Precision) extension in order to speed up arbitrary precision integer arithmetic operations.
suggest.pear-pear/PHP_Compat: Install PHP_Compat to get phpseclib working on PHP < 4.3.3.
